title: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Creamy alfredo sauce with grilled chicken and fettuccine pasta.

title: Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef patty with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce on a brioche bun.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Fresh vegetables stir-fried with tofu in a savory sauce, served with steamed rice.

title: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with seasonal vegetables.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

title: Chicken Biryani
description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with tender chicken pieces and aromatic spices.

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian rice dish cooked with mushrooms, white wine, and parmesan cheese.

title: Fish and Chips
description: Crispy battered fish served with golden fries and tartar sauce.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

title: Chicken Shawarma
description: Marinated chicken wrapped in pita bread with garlic sauce and fresh vegetables.

title: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layers of pasta, vegetables, tomato sauce, and cheese baked to perfection.
